pages.text: These are the things that have been disabled in Spectralarity. If available, it also lists why the thing was disabled, viewable here by hovering over the [?].
$(li)Regions Unexplored biomes:$(li2)Autumnal Maple Forest$(li2)Redwoods $(t:Overlap with Terrestria)[?]$()$(li2)Sparse Redwoods $(t:Overlap with Terrestria)[?]$()

$(li)Botania's tall mystical flowers and shimmering mushrooms do not spawn$(li)Crafting recipes for Botania's shimmering mushrooms $(t:Progression skip)[?]$()$(li)Crushing Wheel recipe for Amethyst Shard into Amethyst Dust $(t:Recipe conflict)[?]$()$(li)Soap recipes for converting magical blocks into their white variants $(t:Nonsenical, and progression skip)[?]$(li)Unlimited Accessor
